==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|sēr}}, from {{inh|de|goh|sēr||sored, injured}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*sairaz}}. Cognate with {{cog|en|sore}}, {{cog|nl|zeer}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|[zeːɐ̯]}} * {{audio|de|De-sehr.ogg}} * {{a|Austria}} {{audio|de|De-at-sehr.ogg}} * {{rhymes|de|eːɐ̯}} ===Adverb=== {{head|de|adverb|comparative|mehr|superlative|am [[meisten]]}} # [[very]] #: {{ux|de|Ich bin '''sehr''' glücklich.|I am '''very''' happy.}} # [[a lot]], [[much]] #: {{ux|de|Ich vermisse dich '''sehr'''.|I miss you '''a lot'''.}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} ===Anagrams=== * {{l|de|Rehs}}
